div.p: The Conecuh County School system strives for excellence in education by engaging each learner every day. Our mission is to inspire and prepare all students to be lifelong learners and responsible citizens of the world by engaging them in a meaningful and rigorous curriculum that provides opportunities for students to reach their fullest potential. Our schools and staff are exceptionally qualified and committed to the highest education standards. We invite you into our schools and into our community.

li.a: Conecuh County Junior High School K-8
